title: PV Diagram - work during isothermal process

content.question: An ideal gas is sealed in a container with a moveable piston and is taken through the isothermal process from State <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> to State <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>, as shown in the <math alttext="P V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>PV</mi></math> diagram. Which of the following correctly indicates whether the work done on the gas is positive or negative during the process, and provides a valid justification?

skill.text: 3.C: Justify or support a claim using evidence from experimental data, physical representations, or physical principles or laws.
